root.name: Helmet
root.description: The object of Helmet is to avoid the pieces of hardware that are mysteriously falling from the sky while traveling from your apartment building to the shed on the other side of the screen. However, the door on the shed refuses to stay open, meaning that the player must attempt to stay alive underneath the hail of objects that is raining down on them until they have a chance to escape. DSi Virtual Console Pricing Japan: 200 Points
